item.title: MIUI 23.5.6 Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 6 China
item.description:
New Public Beta Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 6 China

Codename: pipa

Version: 23.5.6 | 14.0

Size: 4.9 GB

MD5: None

Changelog:
Android 14 Beta.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.5.0.UMZIDXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 6 Indonesia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 6 Indonesia

Codename: pipa

Version: OS1.0.5.0.UMZIDXM | 14.0

Size: 5.1 GB

MD5: 673a8f62fe2cf85565d004a0da1dad25

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[Lock screen]
Optimization: New "press and hold to edit" logic for Lock screen reduces accidental triggers
[Calculator]
Optimization: Improved the sensitivity of Calculator buttons

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.8.0.UMZCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 6 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 6 China

Codename: pipa

Version: OS1.0.8.0.UMZCNXM | 14.0

Size: 5.8 GB

MD5: e1287bd6215d828d8cf28ec2328ba3ba

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[Lock screen]
Optimization: New "press and hold to edit" logic for Lock screen reduces accidental triggers
[Gallery]
Optimization: Improved video synchronization strategy to enhance playback smoothness
[Security]
Optimization: Updated optimization score calculation rules to improve accuracy
[Other]
Introducing Education Center
